title: The Iowa caucuses' biggest loser is the Iowa caucuses

author: Steve Benen
title: When it comes to Iowa, Trump throws stones from a glass house

content:
It seems no one is enjoying the Iowa’s presidential caucus fiasco more than Donald Trump. USA Todaynoted this morning:
President Donald Trump and his aides gleefully mocked the Democrats over the delayed results in Iowa’s first-in-the-nation presidential nom… [+2180 chars]

title: Perhaps Iowa's debacle could refocus attention on election security?

title: As his trial winds down, Trump's 'enemies list' takes shape

author: Steve Benen
title: For Trump's legal defense team, the truth was never good enough
description: In their opening arguments, Trump's legal team peddled brazen falsehoods. In their closing arguments, his lawyers did the same thing.
content: On the first day of Donald Trump’s Senate impeachment trial, the president’s legal defense team set an early tone for the proceedings, presenting a series of claims that were plainly false. As we discussed soon after, the lawyers lied about the House process;… [+3266 chars]

author: Steve Benen
title: Democratic turnout in Iowa was expected...
description: Many Iowa Democrats expected caucus turnout at all-time highs. It now appears that's not even close to what happened.
content:
We still don’t know how the Democratic presidential candidates fared in last night’s Iowa caucuses, but party officials have confirmed that voter turnout was on pace with the turnout from four years ago. For Dems, that’s not exactly good news.
